website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality infield glove from an industry-leading brand.
pros: Constructed from pro-stock leather that ensures long-lasting strength and durability
Dri-Lex wrist lining helps keep a ballplayer's hand cool
cons: More expensive than  comparable infield gloves

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glove. 11yrs old son uses glove at 3rd ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glove. 11yrs old son uses glove at 3rd base. I broke the glove in about 2 weeks with Wilson leather oil and a glove mallet. Son played catch for about 2 weeks and it was ready for game time. I can see this glove lasting 6-8yrs when properly taken care off.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Poveda

customer_reviews.title: Great glove moving to varsity.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Son loves it. Working to break it in.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality glove. Should last for a long time. Go Cubs!
customer_reviews.author: Erik N Schossow

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great glove after it’s broke in. Very stiff but well worth it once you get it soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but lacing was wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our purchase until my son noticed that the lacing at the top was a mess. Missed holes, leather wrong direction. Had to have it relaced, which took some of the fun out of his "big" Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove
customer_reviews.text: Super quality glove!!! You definitely get what you pay for & this glove is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: The glove was able to be broken in without any difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Mary dolansky

customer_reviews.title: Best Glove on Market
customer_reviews.text: Top Knotch product. They dont make them better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glove for a 12 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 year old son. He is amazed that it has molded to his hand so well. Fit is incredible once you work it in. Glove conditioner and mallet, no steam.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMom518

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this glove! Ready to hit the field with it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss with an A2000
customer_reviews.text: Much less expensive than in the local stores.... especially on Pride Day. A2000 are "lifetime" gloves and the right value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: NMChknHwk

product_meta.title: Wilson A2000 Baseball Glove Series
product_meta.description: Cy Young winner Clayton Kershaw knows what works, and he chooses to pitch with the A2000 CK22 GM. This baseball glove features a deep pocket and closed 2 piece web for total ball and grip concealment. Designed in black Pro Stock Leather, the A2000 CK22 conceals grip changes and is there for you on line drives too. Wilson spent decades working with MLB players to refine the A2000 baseball glove so that it outperforms and outlasts all others. Pro Stock patterns, developed by Master Craftsman Shigeaki Aso, are constructed with durable Pro Stock Leather to provide the performance MLB players demand game after game. The result is a ball glove that breaks in perfectly for hardworking players everywhere. - 11.75 Inch Model - Pitcher/Infield Model - Clayton Kershaw's Game Model Glove - 2-Piece Web - Pro Stock Leather for a long lasting glove and a great break-in - Dual Welting for a durable pocket - DriLex Wrist Lining to keep your hand cool and dry
feature_bullets: Black and Blonde Pro Stock Leather, preferred for its rugged durability and unmatched feel
Dual Welting for a durable pocket and long-lasting break-in
Double lacing at the base of the web
Thin heel pad, designed for quicker break-in and better closure; Flat Finger Binding
